author: pablodecm
body:
This adds the DeepFlavour model transformed to a constant GraphDef format, produced by using https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/graph_util/convert_variables_to_constants, which reduces significantly the memory overhead of loading the model (from O(100) MB to O(1) MB ) which is crucial for integration in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19893.

The changes in https://github.com/pablodecm/cmssw/pull/9 are awaiting to be pushed once this is merged and available in IBs and allow to use this model format directly.
title: add DeepFlavour model in GraphDef format
